sections.body: This is the lowest-level spell that lets you teleport; it has a limited range and disorients you until your next turn.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Designing Spells/Benchmarks/4th Level/Dimension Door
sections.name: Dimension Door

sections.body: This is the lowest-level spell that gives the target negative levels.
sections.name: Enervation

sections.body: This is the lowest-level spell that can directly kill a creature, but allows two saves to resist it.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Designing Spells/Benchmarks/4th Level/Phantasmal Killer
sections.name: Phantasmal Killer
